name: Herb-Crusted Chicken with Veggies
instructions: Heat oven to 400°F (205°C). Toss chicken with 1–2 tbsp oil, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper on a sheet pan. Roast 15–25 min (seafood 8–12 min), flipping once, until browned and tender. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal. Serve hot with the prepared starch/veg.

name: Lemon Pepper Beans with Greens
instructions: Prep ingredients; season beans well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Simmer until flavors meld and beans are hot throughout. Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Stir-Fry Seafood with Veggies
instructions: Slice seafood thinly; season lightly with salt and pepper. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok/skillet over high heat until shimmering. Stir-fry protein 2–4 min until just cooked; remove to a plate. Add veggies; stir-fry 2–3 min. Return protein; add sauce and toss 1 min. Cook until opaque and flakes easily (145°F / 63°C). Serve immediately over rice/noodles.

name: Pasta Beans with Pasta
instructions: Prep ingredients; season beans well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Simmer until flavors meld and beans are hot throughout. Adjust seasoning and serve.

instructions: Prep ingredients; season beef well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. For steaks, cook to at least 145°F (63°C) for medium; ground beef 160°F (71°C). Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Grilled Beans with Rice
instructions: Pat beans dry; toss with 1 tbsp oil, salt, pepper and spices. Preheat grill (or grill pan) to medium-high; oil grates. name: Slow-Cooker Pork with Greens
instructions: Season pork and sear in a skillet (optional) for extra flavor. Add to pot/slow cooker with aromatics, veg, spices and a cup of broth. Simmer gently (stovetop 30–45 min; slow cooker 4–6 hrs on LOW) until tender. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal, then rest 3 minutes. Adjust seasoning; garnish and serve.

name: Thai-Style Seafood with Greens
instructions: Prep ingredients; season seafood well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Cook until opaque and flakes easily (145°F / 63°C). Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Thai-Style Seafood with Pasta
instructions: Prep ingredients; season seafood well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Cook until opaque and flakes easily (145°F / 63°C). Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Roasted Beans with Veggies
instructions: Heat oven to 400°F (205°C). Toss beans with 1–2 tbsp oil, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper on a sheet pan. Roast 15–25 min (seafood 8–12 min), flipping once, until browned and tender. Simmer until flavors meld and beans are hot throughout. Serve hot with the prepared starch/veg.

name: Spicy Lamb with Herbs
instructions: Prep ingredients; season lamb well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Cook to at least 145°F (63°C). Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Slow-Cooker Turkey with Herbs
instructions: Season turkey and sear in a skillet (optional) for extra flavor. Add to pot/slow cooker with aromatics, veg, spices and a cup of broth. Simmer gently (stovetop 30–45 min; slow cooker 4–6 hrs on LOW) until tender. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal. Adjust seasoning; garnish and serve.

name: Grilled Turkey with Peppers
instructions: Pat turkey dry; toss with 1 tbsp oil, salt, pepper and spices. Preheat grill (or grill pan) to medium-high; oil grates. Grill turkey 4–6 min per side (seafood 2–3 min/side) until nicely charred. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal. Rest 3 minutes (if meat), then slice and serve with sides.

name: Mediterranean Pork with Herbs
instructions: Prep ingredients; season pork well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal, then rest 3 minutes. Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Stir-Fry Seafood with Peppers
instructions: Slice seafood thinly; season lightly with salt and pepper. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok/skillet over high heat until shimmering. Stir-fry protein 2–4 min until just cooked; remove to a plate. Add veggies; stir-fry 2–3 min. Return protein; add sauce and toss 1 min. Cook until opaque and flakes easily (145°F / 63°C). Serve immediately over rice/noodles.

name: Curry Pork with Veggies
instructions: Season pork and sear in a skillet (optional) for extra flavor. Add to pot/slow cooker with aromatics, veg, spices and a cup of broth. Simmer gently (stovetop 30–45 min; slow cooker 4–6 hrs on LOW) until tender. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal, then rest 3 minutes. Adjust seasoning; garnish and serve.

name: Curry Turkey with Greens
instructions: Season turkey and sear in a skillet (optional) for extra flavor. Add to pot/slow cooker with aromatics, veg, spices and a cup of broth. Simmer gently (stovetop 30–45 min; slow cooker 4–6 hrs on LOW) until tender. Cook to 165°F (74°C) internal. Adjust seasoning; garnish and serve.

name: Thai-Style Pork with Herbs
instructions: Prep ingredients; season pork well. Cook over medium heat until done, adding aromatics and veg as needed. Cook to 145°F (63°C) internal, then rest 3 minutes. Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Baked Lamb with Herbs
instructions: Heat oven to 400°F (205°C). Toss lamb with 1–2 tbsp oil, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper on a sheet pan. Roast 15–25 min (seafood 8–12 min), flipping once, until browned and tender. Cook to at least 145°F (63°C). Serve hot with the prepared starch/veg.

name: Pan-Seared Tofu with Greens
instructions: Season tofu with salt, pepper and spices. Heat 1–2 tbsp oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Sear 3–5 min per side (seafood 2–3 min) until browned. Reduce heat to medium; add aromatics/veg and cook 3–5 min more. Sauté until lightly crisp and heated through. Finish with a splash of lemon/broth; serve over starch.
